title: Untangling the World Knot of Consciousness #11 w/ Gregg Henriques - The Cognitive Science Show
description: Gregg and develop the insight about what we come to call valence qualia, and Gregg continues to describe and explain the integration of SIMM-RR into his framework. We move into the discussion of relational relevance realization. This begins to foreshadow responding to the meaning crisis and reflection on the nature and function of the self.
